data.title: Sidney Toler, Charlie Chan of films, on Wikitree
data.meta_description: Irby-1076 recently added the profile for Hooper G. "Sidney" Toler.  I added the Notable sticker  ... a teenager and is buried here with his parents.)
data.text:
Thank you, Elizabeth, for creating this profile. And thank you, Michelle, for bringing it to our attention.

My husband and I have watched a number of Sidney Toler's "Charlie Chan" movies, as well as a couple of westerns he was in. We have enjoyed all of what we've seen, but especially liked his portrayals of characters in "Heritage of the Desert" and "The Mysterious Rider" both based on Zane Grey novels.
